channel.title: GitHub on Abdurrahman Rajab
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Abdurrahman Rajab

item.title: Karma and tech communities
item.description: karma hits back ✌️ ✨ Recently I have started a new show with GitHub education focused on the MENA region which has a goal of empowering Arabic speaking people by showing them tech role models in different fields, and widen their horizon to new unique technological areas.

item.title: Empowering open source communities
item.description: Empowering open source communities in higher education: a case study. In this article, I will discuss the idea of empowering and getting more people engaged in the open-source communities based on my experience for four years as a Computer engineering student in Turkey.
